meanings.definition: A small terrestrial crustacean with a segmented body that rolls itself into a ball when disturbed.
meanings.sent1: I found some pillbugs under the rock in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The pillbugs curled up into a ball when I touched them.
meanings.sent3: The pillbugs decided to have a race, but they all rolled into balls at the starting line!
meanings.sent4: The pillbugs in the garden were like tiny armored tanks, ready to defend themselves.
meanings.sent5: As a child, I was fascinated by the way pillbugs could transform into little spheres for protection.
